Class LetterOfCreditRecord

Packaged in : LC.Contract.jar

    • Constructor Detail

      • LetterOfCreditRecord

        public LetterOfCreditRecord(T24Context)
        Default constructor. Create an empty LetterOfCreditRecord

      • LetterOfCreditRecord

        public LetterOfCreditRecord(TStructure)
        Constructor with Generic structure.

    • Method Detail

      • addAddAmtCovered

        public void addAddAmtCovered(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified AddAmtCovered to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to specify any additional amounts covered by this LC, i.e. charges, transportation costs, etc. Used only for the production of LC documents and advices, to specify any additional amounts that are covered by this LC (as described in S.W.I.F.T. MT700 field no. 39c) Validation Rules: Multivalue field of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        param - the AddAmtCovered to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addAddAmtCovered

        public void addAddAmtCovered(TField param)
        Appends the specified AddAmtCovered to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to specify any additional amounts covered by this LC, i.e. charges, transportation costs, etc. Used only for the production of LC documents and advices, to specify any additional amounts that are covered by this LC (as described in S.W.I.F.T. MT700 field no. 39c) Validation Rules: Multivalue field of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        param - the AddAmtCovered to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addAdditionlConds

        public void addAdditionlConds(TField param)
        Appends the specified AdditionlConds to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field can be used to provide a description of additional conditions that are not detailed elsewhere. The contents of this field may be printed on messages and advices generated by the system. This field represents 47A for LC Issuance. When used to create an amendment message using Operation A, any modification to this field identify that the additional conditions of the LC contract is amended. The additional conditions details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 47B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 47B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both ADDITIONL.CONDS and CLAUSES.TXT, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the AdditionlConds to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addAdditionlConds

        public void addAdditionlConds(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified AdditionlConds to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field can be used to provide a description of additional conditions that are not detailed elsewhere. The contents of this field may be printed on messages and advices generated by the system. This field represents 47A for LC Issuance. When used to create an amendment message using Operation A, any modification to this field identify that the additional conditions of the LC contract is amended. The additional conditions details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 47B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 47B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both ADDITIONL.CONDS and CLAUSES.TXT, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the AdditionlConds to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addAdviseThru

        public void addAdviseThru(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified AdviseThru to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to identify the bank (which is not a customer of the bank) which is assigned to act as the intermediary between the advising bank of a Letter of Credit/ Collecting Bank or a Documentary Collection and the beneficiary/drawee. If an intermediary between the advising bank/collecting bank and the beneficiary is required, but the intermediary chosen is not a customer of the bank, then this field allows the input of a free format name and address of the chosen bank. It will be used to route all documents/advices for advising/presenting to the beneficiary/drawee. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if ADVISE.THRU.CUSTNO is entered.

        Parameters:
        param - the AdviseThru to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addAdviseThru

        public void addAdviseThru(TField param)
        Appends the specified AdviseThru to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to identify the bank (which is not a customer of the bank) which is assigned to act as the intermediary between the advising bank of a Letter of Credit/ Collecting Bank or a Documentary Collection and the beneficiary/drawee. If an intermediary between the advising bank/collecting bank and the beneficiary is required, but the intermediary chosen is not a customer of the bank, then this field allows the input of a free format name and address of the chosen bank. It will be used to route all documents/advices for advising/presenting to the beneficiary/drawee. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if ADVISE.THRU.CUSTNO is entered.

        Parameters:
        param - the AdviseThru to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        public void addAdvisingBk(TField param)
        Appends the specified AdvisingBk to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: For Import Letters of Credit this field identifies the name and address of the advising bank. For Inward Documentary Collections this field identifies the name and address of the Remitting Bank. This field is mandatory if the ADVISING.BK.CUSTNO. has not been input. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        param - the AdvisingBk to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free format field is used to describe amendments to the transaction, other than Amount/CCY/Maturity date, which can be amended in their specific fields. Validation Rules: 6 x 35 type S (Swift Standard Format).

        Parameters:
        param - the Amendments to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free format field is used to describe amendments to the transaction, other than Amount/CCY/Maturity date, which can be amended in their specific fields. Validation Rules: 6 x 35 type S (Swift Standard Format).

      • addApplicant

        public void addApplicant(TField param)
        Appends the specified Applicant to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the name and address of the Applicant / Drawee / Drawer. LETTERS OF CREDIT For Letters of Credit, this field identifies the applicant's name and address on whose behalf of a Letter of Credit is issued. Although the initial values are defaulted from the Customer file, yet they may be altered with an alternate address that the Bank may think is apt. In the case of Transferred Letter of Credit, this field holds the value of the Original Beneficiary of the Parent Letter of Credit. DOCUMENTARY COLLECTIONS For Documentary Collections, this field identifies the bank's customer's name and address i.e. Drawee (inward collection) or drawer (outward collection). Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Only allowed if APPLICANT.CUSTNO is not entered.

        Parameters:
        param - the Applicant to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addApplicant

        public void addApplicant(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified Applicant to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the name and address of the Applicant / Drawee / Drawer. LETTERS OF CREDIT For Letters of Credit, this field identifies the applicant's name and address on whose behalf of a Letter of Credit is issued. Although the initial values are defaulted from the Customer file, yet they may be altered with an alternate address that the Bank may think is apt. In the case of Transferred Letter of Credit, this field holds the value of the Original Beneficiary of the Parent Letter of Credit. DOCUMENTARY COLLECTIONS For Documentary Collections, this field identifies the bank's customer's name and address i.e. Drawee (inward collection) or drawer (outward collection). Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Only allowed if APPLICANT.CUSTNO is not entered.

        Parameters:
        param - the Applicant to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        Field description: Used for the production of letter of credit messages/advices, this field identifies the bank authorised to pay, accept, or negotiate documents presented under the L/C if it is not a customer of the bank with a valid CUSTOMER.NO. This field is not required for collections. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. If this field is entered, then AVAIL.WITH.CUSTNO must be blank.

      • addBankToBank

        public void addBankToBank(TField param)
        Appends the specified BankToBank to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field specifies additional information for the Receiver. This field represents tag72Z in the SWIFT Message type MT700. This is a freetext and allows the user to input any information apart from the those sepcified in the structured fields in the message. Validation Rules: Optional field. Max 6 lines allowed and each lines can have 35Z characters. Also, allows Z Characters when a MT700/705/707/710/720 messages are generated

        Parameters:
        param - the BankToBank to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addChargesDet

        public void addChargesDet(TField param)
        Appends the specified ChargesDet to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: The field will be mapped against Tag 71D of Outward and Inward MT730 messages. or of MT740 When set to MT730, the valid codes are: AGENT - Agents Commission COMM - Our commission CORCOM - Our correspondent's commission DISC - Commercial discount INSUR - Insurance premium POST - Our postage STAMP - Stamp duty WAREHOUS - Wharfing and warehouse When set to MT740, the valid codes are: DISCCHGS - Discount Charges. ACCECHGS - Acceptance Charges. Any code used in this field must be between slashes and must appear at the beginning of a line. These codes must have been defined in the SWIFT.CODE.WORDS. Narrative text must not begin with a slash and, if used, must begin on a new line and be the last information in the field. Validation Rules: 1-6 lines of 35 type X (Alphanumeric) characters Allows Z characters when a MT730/740 is generated.

        Parameters:
        param - the ChargesDet to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addChargesDet

        public void addChargesDet(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified ChargesDet to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: The field will be mapped against Tag 71D of Outward and Inward MT730 messages. or of MT740 When set to MT730, the valid codes are: AGENT - Agents Commission COMM - Our commission CORCOM - Our correspondent's commission DISC - Commercial discount INSUR - Insurance premium POST - Our postage STAMP - Stamp duty WAREHOUS - Wharfing and warehouse When set to MT740, the valid codes are: DISCCHGS - Discount Charges. ACCECHGS - Acceptance Charges. Any code used in this field must be between slashes and must appear at the beginning of a line. These codes must have been defined in the SWIFT.CODE.WORDS. Narrative text must not begin with a slash and, if used, must begin on a new line and be the last information in the field. Validation Rules: 1-6 lines of 35 type X (Alphanumeric) characters Allows Z characters when a MT730/740 is generated.

        Parameters:
        param - the ChargesDet to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDeferredPay

        public void addDeferredPay(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified DeferredPay to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free text field will specify the payment date or method for its determination for which deferred payment or a Negotiation drawings will be made under the LC. Validation Rules: 4 x 35 alphanumeric characters. If the LC type is DP(Deferred Payment), this field is mandatory input. If the LC type is N or NS, this field is an optional field. However override raised when no value is inputted. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY DEF PAYMENT", standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC. E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        param - the DeferredPay to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDeferredPay

        public void addDeferredPay(TField param)
        Appends the specified DeferredPay to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free text field will specify the payment date or method for its determination for which deferred payment or a Negotiation drawings will be made under the LC. Validation Rules: 4 x 35 alphanumeric characters. If the LC type is DP(Deferred Payment), this field is mandatory input. If the LC type is N or NS, this field is an optional field. However override raised when no value is inputted. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY DEF PAYMENT", standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC. E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        param - the DeferredPay to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDescGoods

        public void addDescGoods(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified DescGoods to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the creation of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the description of the goods covered by the transaction. This field represents tag 45A while issuance of a LC. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this field identify that the description goods of the LC contract is amended. The description of goods can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 45B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 45B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/705/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. A maximum of 250 lines are only allowed Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the DescGoods to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDescGoods

        public void addDescGoods(TField param)
        Appends the specified DescGoods to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the creation of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the description of the goods covered by the transaction. This field represents tag 45A while issuance of a LC. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this field identify that the description goods of the LC contract is amended. The description of goods can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 45B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 45B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/705/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. A maximum of 250 lines are only allowed Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the DescGoods to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDocumentCode

        public void addDocumentCode(DocumentCodeClass param)
        Appends the specified DocumentCode to the end of the collection.
        Parameters:
        param - the DocumentCode to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDocumentsReq

        public void addDocumentsReq(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified DocumentsReq to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field contains the description of the documents to be presented by under the letter of credit. It will be included in messages/advices generated by the application. This field represents 46A for LC Issuance. The descriptions input to this field will be used in addition to the predefined documents input in the DOCUMENT.CODE field. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this narrative structured text field identify that the document required of the LC contract is amended. The document details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 46B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 46B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept x (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both DOCUMENT.TXT and DOCUMENTS.REQ, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the DocumentsReq to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDocumentsReq

        public void addDocumentsReq(TField param)
        Appends the specified DocumentsReq to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field contains the description of the documents to be presented by under the letter of credit. It will be included in messages/advices generated by the application. This field represents 46A for LC Issuance. The descriptions input to this field will be used in addition to the predefined documents input in the DOCUMENT.CODE field. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this narrative structured text field identify that the document required of the LC contract is amended. The document details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 46B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 46B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept x (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both DOCUMENT.TXT and DOCUMENTS.REQ, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        param - the DocumentsReq to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDraftsAt

        public void addDraftsAt(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified DraftsAt to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used in the production of messages/advices, this field indicates the tenor of the draft to be presented under the Letter of Credit. Example: when a letter of credit has a tenor of 120 days sight, '120 days sight' will be entered in this field. Validation Rules: 35 alphanumeric characters. If this field is used then the Tenor field must be blank and either DRAWEE.CUST.NO or DRAWEE must have a value. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY ACCEPTANCE or BY NEGOTIATION"(Negotiation Acceptance), standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        param - the DraftsAt to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDraftsAt

        public void addDraftsAt(TField param)
        Appends the specified DraftsAt to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used in the production of messages/advices, this field indicates the tenor of the draft to be presented under the Letter of Credit. Example: when a letter of credit has a tenor of 120 days sight, '120 days sight' will be entered in this field. Validation Rules: 35 alphanumeric characters. If this field is used then the Tenor field must be blank and either DRAWEE.CUST.NO or DRAWEE must have a value. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY ACCEPTANCE or BY NEGOTIATION"(Negotiation Acceptance), standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        param - the DraftsAt to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDrawee

        public void addDrawee(TField param)
        Appends the specified Drawee to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the drawee of Bills of Exchange to be presented under the LC, if the drawee is not a customer of the bank with a valid CUSTOMER.NO. Drawees Name and Address may be manually input. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A Alphanumeric characters.. If DRAFTS.AT is used, either this field or DRAWEE.CUST.NO must have a value. If this field is used, then DRAWEE.CUST.NO must be left blank. If the LC type is DP (Deferred Payment) this field must be left blank.

        Parameters:
        param - the Drawee to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addDrawee

        public void addDrawee(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified Drawee to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the drawee of Bills of Exchange to be presented under the LC, if the drawee is not a customer of the bank with a valid CUSTOMER.NO. Drawees Name and Address may be manually input. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A Alphanumeric characters.. If DRAFTS.AT is used, either this field or DRAWEE.CUST.NO must have a value. If this field is used, then DRAWEE.CUST.NO must be left blank. If the LC type is DP (Deferred Payment) this field must be left blank.

        Parameters:
        param - the Drawee to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        public void addIssuingBank(TField param)

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the Issuing Bank for an Export Letter of Credit and the Collecting Bank for an Outward Documentary Collection. Input is mandatory if the Bank in question is not a customer on the CUSTOMER file and the respective customer no. has not been inserted in the field ISSUING.BANK.NO. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed for Inward Documentation Collections / Import Letters of Credit.

      • addMt759Narrative

        public void addMt759Narrative(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified Mt759Narrative to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Free text field that allows the user to input the details of the request or the information. Input allowed only when operation is 'M' This field will be mapped against the tag 45D of a MT759 message. Format : 150*65z ( of 8 sequences) Accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters System auto populates 'Tag 27 - Sequence of Total' based on the number of MT759 messages generated. Only upto 8 sequences allowed(i.e. 8/8). This field allows to input a maximum of 1200 lines of 65 characters(Z character set). For each of the 150 lines, T24 generates multiple MT759 messages and a maximum of upto 8/8 sequence of messages can generated. Mandatory field for a MT759 message. Validation Rules: The number of lines in this field cannot exceed 1200.

        Parameters:
        param - the Mt759Narrative to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addMt759Narrative

        public void addMt759Narrative(TField param)
        Appends the specified Mt759Narrative to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Free text field that allows the user to input the details of the request or the information. Input allowed only when operation is 'M' This field will be mapped against the tag 45D of a MT759 message. Format : 150*65z ( of 8 sequences) Accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters System auto populates 'Tag 27 - Sequence of Total' based on the number of MT759 messages generated. Only upto 8 sequences allowed(i.e. 8/8). This field allows to input a maximum of 1200 lines of 65 characters(Z character set). For each of the 150 lines, T24 generates multiple MT759 messages and a maximum of upto 8/8 sequence of messages can generated. Mandatory field for a MT759 message. Validation Rules: The number of lines in this field cannot exceed 1200.

        nothing

        public void addNarrativeChrgs(TField param)
        Appends the specified NarrativeChrgs to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free text field is used to specify charges to be borne by the beneficiary(71D) when an LC is issued. If modified during an amendment(Operation A), this field specifies any changes to the charges(71D) borne by the beneficiary. Validation Rules: Optional Input 6*35 Alphanumeric with X characters. Also, accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/710/720/740 is generated Defaults standard text - All charges outside (Applicant's Country) are for the account of Beneficiary' for import LC's.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        nothing

Allowed to input only during amendment of LC record. Not allowed to input if drawings are present under the Collection. Not allowed if LC is already fully utilised. Should not be more than 20 lines.

      • addPresentPeriod

        public void addPresentPeriod(TField param)
        Appends the specified PresentPeriod to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices this field specifies the number of days after the date of issuance of the transports document(s) within which the documents must be presented for payment, acceptance or negotiation. When presentation days is defined for import LC, system will default standard text 'Documents must be present within (Presentation Days) from the date of shipment but before the expiry of credit'. Validation Rules: 35 type Alphanumeric characters. Optional input (if left blank UCP rules apply) Field not used if SWIFT standards are updated as per 2018 revision.

        Parameters:
        param - the PresentPeriod to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        nothing

      • addReimbNarrative

        public void addReimbNarrative(TField param)
        Appends the specified ReimbNarrative to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field allows to input amendments of a reimbursement (Narrative of MT747) that has been included in the message. The value present in this field is populated in Tag 77 of MT747. Validation Rules: Up to 20 lines of 35 characters. Accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT747 is generated.

        Parameters:
        param - the ReimbNarrative to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addReqConfBnkName

        public void addReqConfBnkName(TField param)
        Appends the specified ReqConfBnkName to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the bank which is requested by the issuing bank to add its confirmation or may add its confirmation to the documentary credit. It contains the name and address of the requested confirming bank. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Input in this field is allowed only if the values in the field CONFIRM.INST is CONFIRM or MAY ADD. Either REQ.CONF.BNK or REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME is mandatory. If REQ.CONF.BNK is input, then, upon validation, the name and address of the confirming bank is to be defaulted into the REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME field. The name and address is defaulted from the CUSTOMER record.

        Parameters:
        param - the ReqConfBnkName to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addReqConfBnkName

        public void addReqConfBnkName(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified ReqConfBnkName to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the bank which is requested by the issuing bank to add its confirmation or may add its confirmation to the documentary credit. It contains the name and address of the requested confirming bank. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Input in this field is allowed only if the values in the field CONFIRM.INST is CONFIRM or MAY ADD. Either REQ.CONF.BNK or REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME is mandatory. If REQ.CONF.BNK is input, then, upon validation, the name and address of the confirming bank is to be defaulted into the REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME field. The name and address is defaulted from the CUSTOMER record.

        Parameters:
        param - the ReqConfBnkName to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addShipmentPeriod

        public void addShipmentPeriod(TField param)
        Appends the specified ShipmentPeriod to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices, this free text field stipulates the period of time which the goods are to be loaded on board/dispatched/taken in charge. Validation Rules: 6 x 65 type A alphanumeric characters. Input to this field is not permitted if the field <LATEST.SHIPMENT> has been used.

        Parameters:
        param - the ShipmentPeriod to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices, this free text field stipulates the period of time which the goods are to be loaded on board/dispatched/taken in charge.       • addStmtEntryNo

        public void addStmtEntryNo(TField param)
        Appends the specified StmtEntryNo to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: System maintained field. This field displays either a statement entry number or a category entry number depending on the value contained in the corresponding multivalue fields of the contract. Note : The only statement and category entries raised on this deal will relate to charge entries. All other entries are CRF contingent entries.

        Parameters:
        param - the StmtEntryNo to append
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: System maintained field. This field displays either a statement entry number or a category entry number depending on the value contained in the corresponding multivalue fields of the contract. Note : The only statement and category entries raised on this deal will relate to charge entries. All other entries are CRF contingent entries.

      • addThirdParty

        public void addThirdParty(java.lang.CharSequence param)
        Appends the specified ThirdParty to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Optional input. For letters of credit, this field identifies the reimbursing third party bank, through whom reimbursement will be made to the negotiating bank, if this is not a customer of the bank. For collection this field is used to identify the Name & Address of the Account with Bank. If the third party reimbursing bank is not one of the banks customers (i.e. not on the customer file), then this field allows the input of a name and address of the reimbursing bank. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if THIRD.PARTY.CUSTNO is set.

        Parameters:
        param - the ThirdParty to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • addThirdParty

        public void addThirdParty(TField param)
        Appends the specified ThirdParty to the end of the collection.
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Optional input. For letters of credit, this field identifies the reimbursing third party bank, through whom reimbursement will be made to the negotiating bank, if this is not a customer of the bank. For collection this field is used to identify the Name & Address of the Account with Bank. If the third party reimbursing bank is not one of the banks customers (i.e. not on the customer file), then this field allows the input of a name and address of the reimbursing bank. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if THIRD.PARTY.CUSTNO is set.

        Parameters:
        param - the ThirdParty to append
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearAddAmtCovered

        public void clearAddAmtCovered()
        Clear the collection of AddAmtCovered
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to specify any additional amounts covered by this LC, i.e. charges, transportation costs, etc. Used only for the production of LC documents and advices, to specify any additional amounts that are covered by this LC (as described in S.W.I.F.T. MT700 field no. 39c) Validation Rules: Multivalue field of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearAdditionlConds

        public void clearAdditionlConds()
        Clear the collection of AdditionlConds
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field can be used to provide a description of additional conditions that are not detailed elsewhere. The contents of this field may be printed on messages and advices generated by the system. This field represents 47A for LC Issuance. When used to create an amendment message using Operation A, any modification to this field identify that the additional conditions of the LC contract is amended. The additional conditions details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 47B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 47B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both ADDITIONL.CONDS and CLAUSES.TXT, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearAdviseThru

        public void clearAdviseThru()
        Clear the collection of AdviseThru
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used to identify the bank (which is not a customer of the bank) which is assigned to act as the intermediary between the advising bank of a Letter of Credit/ Collecting Bank or a Documentary Collection and the beneficiary/drawee. If an intermediary between the advising bank/collecting bank and the beneficiary is required, but the intermediary chosen is not a customer of the bank, then this field allows the input of a free format name and address of the chosen bank. It will be used to route all documents/advices for advising/presenting to the beneficiary/drawee. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if ADVISE.THRU.CUSTNO is entered.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearAdvisingBk

        public void clearAdvisingBk()
        Clear the collection of AdvisingBk
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: For Import Letters of Credit this field identifies the name and address of the advising bank. For Inward Documentary Collections this field identifies the name and address of the Remitting Bank. This field is mandatory if the ADVISING.BK.CUSTNO. has not been input. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearAmendments

        public void clearAmendments()
        Clear the collection of Amendments
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free format field is used to describe amendments to the transaction, other than Amount/CCY/Maturity date, which can be amended in their specific fields. Validation Rules: 6 x 35 type S (Swift Standard Format).

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearApplicant

        public void clearApplicant()
        Clear the collection of Applicant
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the name and address of the Applicant / Drawee / Drawer. LETTERS OF CREDIT For Letters of Credit, this field identifies the applicant's name and address on whose behalf of a Letter of Credit is issued. Although the initial values are defaulted from the Customer file, yet they may be altered with an alternate address that the Bank may think is apt. In the case of Transferred Letter of Credit, this field holds the value of the Original Beneficiary of the Parent Letter of Credit. DOCUMENTARY COLLECTIONS For Documentary Collections, this field identifies the bank's customer's name and address i.e. Drawee (inward collection) or drawer (outward collection). Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Only allowed if APPLICANT.CUSTNO is not entered.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field holds the descriptive details or the SWIFT address of the Applicant's Bank if different from Issuing Bank. Validation Rules: 35 Type A (alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of letter of credit messages/advices, this field identifies the bank authorised to pay, accept, or negotiate documents presented under the L/C if it is not a customer of the bank with a valid CUSTOMER.NO. This field is not required for collections. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. If this field is entered, then AVAIL.WITH.CUSTNO must be blank.

        public void clearBankToBank()

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field specifies additional information for the Receiver. This field represents tag72Z in the SWIFT Message type MT700. This is a freetext and allows the user to input any information apart from the those sepcified in the structured fields in the message. Validation Rules: Optional field. Max 6 lines allowed and each lines can have 35Z characters. Also, allows Z Characters when a MT700/705/707/710/720 messages are generated

        Field description: For Letters of Credit this field identifies the Beneficiary's name and address. For Documentary Collections this field identifies the name and address of the bank's customer's counterparty i.e. Drawer (Inward Collections), Drawee (Outward Collections). Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters This file is mandatory if the BENEFICIARY.CUSTNO. has not been input.

        nothing

      • clearChargesDet

        public void clearChargesDet()
        Clear the collection of ChargesDet
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: The field will be mapped against Tag 71D of Outward and Inward MT730 messages. or of MT740 When set to MT730, the valid codes are: AGENT - Agents Commission COMM - Our commission CORCOM - Our correspondent's commission DISC - Commercial discount INSUR - Insurance premium POST - Our postage STAMP - Stamp duty WAREHOUS - Wharfing and warehouse When set to MT740, the valid codes are: DISCCHGS - Discount Charges. ACCECHGS - Acceptance Charges. Any code used in this field must be between slashes and must appear at the beginning of a line. These codes must have been defined in the SWIFT.CODE.WORDS. Narrative text must not begin with a slash and, if used, must begin on a new line and be the last information in the field. Validation Rules: 1-6 lines of 35 type X (Alphanumeric) characters Allows Z characters when a MT730/740 is generated.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDeferredPay

        public void clearDeferredPay()
        Clear the collection of DeferredPay
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free text field will specify the payment date or method for its determination for which deferred payment or a Negotiation drawings will be made under the LC. Validation Rules: 4 x 35 alphanumeric characters. If the LC type is DP(Deferred Payment), this field is mandatory input. If the LC type is N or NS, this field is an optional field. However override raised when no value is inputted. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY DEF PAYMENT", standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC. E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

        Field description: System maintained field. Contains the delivery keys used for the generation of LC advices / documents / payments from the Electronic Delivery System.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDescGoods

        public void clearDescGoods()
        Clear the collection of DescGoods
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the creation of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the description of the goods covered by the transaction. This field represents tag 45A while issuance of a LC. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this field identify that the description goods of the LC contract is amended. The description of goods can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 45B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 45B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept X (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/705/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. A maximum of 250 lines are only allowed Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDocumentCode

        Clear the collection of DocumentCode
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDocumentsReq

        public void clearDocumentsReq()
        Clear the collection of DocumentsReq
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field contains the description of the documents to be presented by under the letter of credit. It will be included in messages/advices generated by the application. This field represents 46A for LC Issuance. The descriptions input to this field will be used in addition to the predefined documents input in the DOCUMENT.CODE field. When used to create an amendment messages using Operation A, any modification of this narrative structured text field identify that the document required of the LC contract is amended. The document details can be modified during the operation A and when AMENDMENT.DEL is set to YES, an MT707 is generated and the amendment details are mapped to tag 46B of the MT707/MT708. When the maximum lines exceeds(250) under this field, the text inputted in this field is auto split and extension message MT708 is generated. The format of the Narrative structured text must begin with the code and must be within slashes (/ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/) for both MT707 (amendment message) and MT708 (extension to amendment message). Multiple codes and multiple combination of codes allowed in the field except for REPALL. No other code is allowed if REPALL is used. ADD - Must be followed by the text to be added (a sentence, paragraph or line item) DELETE - Must be followed by the text to be deleted (a sentence, paragraph or line item) REPALL - Must be followed by the text that replaces all text in same field. No other code may be used. Line 1 (/Code/)(Narrative) Line 2 (Continuation of Narration) Line 3 (/Code/)(Narrative) As per swift, first line of the Narrative structured text in MT708 should begin with the code. User to deduce and input the code manually at the beginning of a MT708 extension message. In case, the user fails to input the code manually, system will automatically add the code at beginning of tag 46B at the time of generation of one or more MT708 extension messages. System will identify the last code evidenced in the previous sequence and prefix this code in the subsequent MT708 messages. If the amendment is handled through LC.AMENDMENTS application and accepted through operation 'D', the user should manually edit the contents to reflect these changes in line with the original instrument (i.e. LETTER.OF.CREDIT application) Validation Rules: Accept x (Alphanumeric) characters Also, Accepts Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/701/710/711/720/721/707/708 is generated Optional input. If input under both DOCUMENT.TXT and DOCUMENTS.REQ, then combined maximum length of the field should not exceed 250 lines. Valid codes to be used are /ADD/, /DELETE/, /REPALL/ in case of amendment.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDraftsAt

        public void clearDraftsAt()
        Clear the collection of DraftsAt
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used in the production of messages/advices, this field indicates the tenor of the draft to be presented under the Letter of Credit. Example: when a letter of credit has a tenor of 120 days sight, '120 days sight' will be entered in this field. Validation Rules: 35 alphanumeric characters. If this field is used then the Tenor field must be blank and either DRAWEE.CUST.NO or DRAWEE must have a value. When AVAILABLE.BY is "BY ACCEPTANCE or BY NEGOTIATION"(Negotiation Acceptance), standard text will be defaulted based on values defined in COLL.MAT.CODE and DAYS field for import LC E.g 120 DAYS AFTER BILL OF EXCHANGE

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDrawType

        public void clearDrawType()
        Clear the collection of DrawType
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearDrawee

        public void clearDrawee()
        Clear the collection of Drawee
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices, this free text field is used to identify the drawee of Bills of Exchange to be presented under the LC, if the drawee is not a customer of the bank with a valid CUSTOMER.NO. Drawees Name and Address may be manually input. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A Alphanumeric characters.. If DRAFTS.AT is used, either this field or DRAWEE.CUST.NO must have a value. If this field is used, then DRAWEE.CUST.NO must be left blank. If the LC type is DP (Deferred Payment) this field must be left blank.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearForwardContract

        public void clearForwardContract()
        Clear the collection of ForwardContract
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field holds FX forward contract IDs booked against the current Letter Of Credit Contract Validation Rules: This is a multi value field Holds only valid FX contract reference

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearIbCustToBk

        public void clearIbCustToBk()
        Clear the collection of IbCustToBk
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the Issuing Bank for an Export Letter of Credit and the Collecting Bank for an Outward Documentary Collection. Input is mandatory if the Bank in question is not a customer on the CUSTOMER file and the respective customer no. has not been inserted in the field ISSUING.BANK.NO. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed for Inward Documentation Collections / Import Letters of Credit.

        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearMt759Narrative

        public void clearMt759Narrative()
        Clear the collection of Mt759Narrative
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Free text field that allows the user to input the details of the request or the information. Input allowed only when operation is 'M' This field will be mapped against the tag 45D of a MT759 message. Format : 150*65z ( of 8 sequences) Accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters System auto populates 'Tag 27 - Sequence of Total' based on the number of MT759 messages generated. Only upto 8 sequences allowed(i.e. 8/8). This field allows to input a maximum of 1200 lines of 65 characters(Z character set). For each of the 150 lines, T24 generates multiple MT759 messages and a maximum of upto 8/8 sequence of messages can generated. Mandatory field for a MT759 message. Validation Rules: The number of lines in this field cannot exceed 1200.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearNarrative

        public void clearNarrative()
        Clear the collection of Narrative
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.
        Parameters:

        nothing

      • clearNarrativeChrgs

        public void clearNarrativeChrgs()
        Clear the collection of NarrativeChrgs
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This free text field is used to specify charges to be borne by the beneficiary(71D) when an LC is issued. If modified during an amendment(Operation A), this field specifies any changes to the charges(71D) borne by the beneficiary. Validation Rules: Optional Input 6*35 Alphanumeric with X characters. Also, accept Z (Alphanumeric) characters when a MT700/710/720/740 is generated Defaults standard text - All charges outside (Applicant's Country) are for the account of Beneficiary' for import LC's.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearNegWithBank

        public void clearNegWithBank()

        Field description: This field allows input of drawer of the drafts, to be drawn on the reimbursing bank, when the drawer is the negotiating bank. The value present in this field is populated in Tag 58a of MT740 Validation Rules: Valid Customer number or BIC Code. 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearNopayReason

        public void clearNopayReason()
        Clear the collection of NopayReason
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field is used to map 77A tag in MT416 message (Inward as well as outward). Validation Rules Allowed to input only when MT416 is set in SEND.COLL.MSG field. Allowed to input only during amendment of LC record. Not allowed to input if drawings are present under the Collection. Not allowed if LC is already fully utilised. Should not be more than 20 lines.

        nothing

      • clearPresentPeriod

        public void clearPresentPeriod()
        Clear the collection of PresentPeriod
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Used for the production of messages/advices this field specifies the number of days after the date of issuance of the transports document(s) within which the documents must be presented for payment, acceptance or negotiation. When presentation days is defined for import LC, system will default standard text 'Documents must be present within (Presentation Days) from the date of shipment but before the expiry of credit'. Validation Rules: 35 type Alphanumeric characters. Optional input (if left blank UCP rules apply) Field not used if SWIFT standards are updated as per 2018 revision.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

      • clearReqConfBnkName

        public void clearReqConfBnkName()
        Clear the collection of ReqConfBnkName
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: This field identifies the bank which is requested by the issuing bank to add its confirmation or may add its confirmation to the documentary credit. It contains the name and address of the requested confirming bank. Validation Rules: 1-4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. Input in this field is allowed only if the values in the field CONFIRM.INST is CONFIRM or MAY ADD. Either REQ.CONF.BNK or REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME is mandatory. If REQ.CONF.BNK is input, then, upon validation, the name and address of the confirming bank is to be defaulted into the REQ.CONF.BNK.NAME field. The name and address is defaulted from the CUSTOMER record.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing

Note : The only statement and category entries raised on this deal will relate to charge entries. All other entries are CRF contingent entries.

      • clearThirdParty

        public void clearThirdParty()
        Clear the collection of ThirdParty
        Throws an UnsupportedOperationException if the object is not modifiable.

        Field description: Optional input. For letters of credit, this field identifies the reimbursing third party bank, through whom reimbursement will be made to the negotiating bank, if this is not a customer of the bank. For collection this field is used to identify the Name & Address of the Account with Bank. If the third party reimbursing bank is not one of the banks customers (i.e. not on the customer file), then this field allows the input of a name and address of the reimbursing bank. Validation Rules: 4 lines of 35 type A (Alphanumeric) characters. No input allowed if THIRD.PARTY.CUSTNO is set.

        Parameters:
        Returns:
        nothing
